- *Rancho* – should not be anyone 
- *Blue* *River* – pending list.

*Separate but nearby aligned task:* 

# Investigate if the Rancho Guadalupe did a bulk remittance enabling. The payroll-only-parcard folks are attached (August 2022)

{noformat}I want to know if the folks in the Tableau table for Rancho were all enabled at once, 
or if it was 1-off requests. If it was all at once, that means we got a list from the 
employer. If it was 1-off requests, it came from the CSR team and we need to verify each 
person with the employer.
{noformat}





AFAIK the paycard only companies that we need to verify are: 
- *Ivanhoe* ([~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3]  has asked for the list)
- *Lewis* (file attached to ticket)
- *Rancho* – should not be anyone

fields.summary: Verify past individual remittance requests so they are indeed H2As

comments.body:
All Lewis farms H2As hav now gotten their remittances enabled. 
We have yet to check all of Lewis farms H2As, for someone who has it enabled and is NOT in this LEWIS farm CSV file

Patterson, Blue River and Ivanhoe had CHs enabled here [https://ganaz.atlassian.net/browse/GAN-5559?jql=labels%20in%20(%27xops_enable_remittances%27)%20order%20by%20created%20DESC|https://ganaz.atlassian.net/browse/GAN-5559?jql=labels%20in%20(%27xops_enable_remittances%27)%20order%20by%20created%20DESC|smart-link]

All CSR requests in 2023 (call-ins) that trigged a remittance enable change are now reviewed. [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-L4RZ-_yrCK7GCWwu4HVYa87-3K6-cTf9odszdOCQ3A/edit?usp=sharing|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-L4RZ-_yrCK7GCWwu4HVYa87-3K6-cTf9odszdOCQ3A/edit?usp=sharing|smart-link]  



* There are *1 person from Ivanhoe Blueberry Farms* that could not be verified
* There are *6 persons from Blue River Legacy Farms* that could not be verified

I believe the next course of action is to ask these Farms to confirm whether or not these 7 individuals have H2A status or not. Who can do that [~accountid:5fa453d014da2600682f0165] ?  [~accountid:618067a4b9c549006f45c3ac]  maybe or [~accountid:63113ce88473817d7d04b3d3] ?

Hi [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] and [~accountid:5fa453d014da2600682f0165] 

*BlueRiver:* All 6 are H2As

*Ivanhoe:* I’ll verify with the farm tomorrow morning.
The last one from Ivanhoe in the google doc is also an H2A [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] I confirmed with the farm this morning.
